attr.title: TheXTech
attr.desc: This is a direct continuation of the SMBX 1.3 engine. Add assets, worlds and play Mario-style games with built-in world editor and many other features!
attr.inst:
Download assets from https://github.com/TheXTech/TheXTech and unpack them to ./thextech/assets/<asset_pack_name>.
Check README for more details!
